messages.title: Roberta is currently running campaigns to:
messages.content: Protect our schools budget from an unfair Tory funding formula. Get justice for 1950s-born WASPI women who have unfairly had their state pension age increased, and protect the value of all pensions. Build more affordable, good quality housing. Defending our front line police service. Secure a sustainable, properly funded future for our NHS and Social Care services. Campaigning to protect Durham from overdevelopment. Ensure young people can access the education and training they need.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Provide a secure, publicly funded NHS
Build 1 million new homes in five years, including new council homes
Raise the living wage to £10 per hour
Provide a national/regional development banks to fund infrastructure
Jobs guarantee scheme for young people and reintroduce EMA

mentions.candidate: Roberta will be the strong voice Durham needs

issues.education: Ensure young people can access the education and training they need
issues.environment: Campaigning to protect Durham from overdevelopment
issues.health: Secure a sustainable, properly funded future for our NHS and Social Care services

housing.content: Build more affordable, good quality housing

leaflet.personalStatement: Roberta Blackman-Woods MP WORKING HARD FOR DURHAM
